project_abstract.cdata: The objectives of the Xiaolangdi Multipurpose Project: Stage II are to: 1) provide flood protection for 103 million people in the North China Plain in rural areas, several large and medium cities and major industrial centers; 2) control sediment accretion in the lower reach of the Yellow River for a period of about 20 years; 3) generate much needed  hydropower; and 4) supply irrigation water (and increase the reliability of irrigation) for some 2 million hectares and ensure more stable water supplies for downstream cities and industries.  The components of the projects are the following: (i) dam and structures, which include preliminary-local works, dam, inlet, outlet, power station, turbines, gates, metalwork, generators, switchyard, contract administration and consulting services; (ii) training; (iii) environmental management plan; (iii) flood, sediment, ice and drought management; (iv) institutional support for the Yellow River Conservancy Commission; and (v) institutional reform training.

P034081.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>小浪底水利枢纽工程项目二期</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是：（1）为华北平原农村地区、几座大中型城市和工业中心的1.03亿人提供防洪保障；（2）控制黄河下游泥沙淤积，使泥沙量在20年内不再增加；（3）生产急需水电；（4）为近200万公顷农田供应灌溉用水（并提高灌溉保证率），确保向下游城市和工业企业更稳定地供水。项目设有以下六个子项目：（1）水库和建筑物子项目，其内容包括基础工程、大坝、进水口和出水口工程、电站、水轮机、闸门、金属工程、发电机、开关站、合同管理及咨询服务；（2）培训子项目；（3）环境管理计划子项目；（4）洪水、泥沙、河冰和旱灾管理子项目；（5）黄河水利委员会机构支持子项目；（6）制度改革培训子项目。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
